title: Exorcist: The Beginning
writer: William Peter Blatty, William Wisher, Caleb Carr
short_cast: Stellan Skarsgård, James D'Arcy, Izabella Scorupco, Remy Sweeney, Julian Wadham, Andrew French, Ralph Brown, Ben Cross, David Bradley, Alan Ford
cast: Stellan Skarsgård, James D'Arcy, Izabella Scorupco, Remy Sweeney, Julian Wadham, Andrew French, Ralph Brown, Ben Cross, David Bradley, Alan Ford
genre: Horror Movies, Movies Based on Books, US Movies
desc: Sent to Africa at the close of World War II to tend to the needs of the local community, Father Lankester Merrin gets more than he ever bargained for when he has his first brush with a devilish force known simply as Pazuzu.
